meanings.sent1: She always preboils the pasta before adding the sauce.
meanings.sent2: It is important to preboil the vegetables before grilling them.
meanings.sent3: The chef preboils the ingredients to save time in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The water preboils before she adds the rice, ensuring it cooks evenly.
meanings.sent5: Preboiling the eggs makes them easier to peel.

meanings.sent1: The preboils potatoes were ready to be mashed for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The preboils chicken was seasoned and ready to be grilled.
meanings.sent3: The preboils soup was a hit at the potluck.
meanings.sent4: The preboils rice absorbed the flavors of the curry perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The preboils pasta saved time when making the lasagna.

meanings.definition: the act of boiling something beforehand
meanings.sent1: She always does the preboils before starting the main cooking.
meanings.sent2: The preboils of the ingredients helped speed up the meal preparation.
meanings.sent3: The preboils of the vegetables made the soup taste even better.
meanings.sent4: The preboils of the pasta cut down the overall cooking time.
meanings.sent5: The preboils of the meat ensured it was tender and flavorful.
